Friday, September 26, 2008, 9:30am-3:30pm - UC Irvine

The workshop will be held at 4011 Donald Bren Hall, Irvine CA 92697

Parking is provided for event attendees in the University Club parking lot (18B) located behind the Donald Bren Hall and directly in front of club. Please register your vehicle at the University Club front desk under the name "CERT Workshop".

To get the directions from Google map click here.

You may also find the directions in the following map:

For complete driving directions to UC Irvine campus click here.

From 405 Freeway

From the North:

  • Exit at Jamboree Rd.
  • Right on Jamboree Rd.
  • Left on Campus Dr.
  • Right on West Peltason into UCI
  • Left on Los Trancos Dr. into the University Club parking lot (18B)

From the South:

  • Exit at University Dr.
  • Left on University Dr.
  • Left on Campus Dr.
  • Right on West Peltason into UCI
  • Left on Los Trancos Dr. into the University Club parking lot (18B)

From 5 Freeway

From the North:

  • Take 5 South to 55 South to 73 South
  • Exit at Bison Ave.
  • Left on Bison Ave. into UCI
  • Right on East Peltason Dr.
  • Left on Los Trancos Dr. into the University Club parking lot (18B)

From the South:

  • Take 5 North to 405 North
  • Exit at University Dr.
  • Left on University Dr.
  • Left on Campus Dr.
  • Right on West Peltason into UCI
  • Left on Los Trancos Dr. into the University Club parking lot (18B)

From 73 Freeway / Tollway

From the North:

  • Exit at Bison Ave.
  • Left on Bison Ave. into UCI
  • Right on East Peltason Dr.
  • Left on Los Trancos Dr. into the University Club parking lot (18B)

From the South (toll):

  • Exit at Bison Ave.
  • Right on Bison Ave. into UCI
  • Right on East Peltason Dr.
  • Left on Los Trancos Dr. into the University Club parking lot (18B)

From 55 Freeway

From the North:

  • Take 55 South to 73 South
  • Exit at Bison Ave.
  • Left on Bison Ave. into UCI
  • Right on East Peltason Dr.
  • Left on Los Trancos Dr. into the University Club parking lot (18B)

From the South:

  • Take 55 North to 73 South
  • Exit at Bison Ave.
  • Left on Bison Ave. into UCI
  • Right on East Peltason Dr.
  • Left on Los Trancos Dr. into the University Club parking lot (18B)
